headline: Aon (NYSE:AON) Enhances Leadership Team With Strategic Industry Appointments
summary: Aon (NYSE:AON) recently appointed David Carlson as its global industrial and manufacturing leader, a move that underscores the company's focus on enhancing industry-specific insights and expertise. Despite these significant leadership changes, Aon's stock price remained relatively flat over the past week with a slight 1% decline. This contrasts with broader market trends, as the S&P 500 and Nasdaq experienced gains. Aon's appointment of Carlson, along with other leadership shifts, may have...

headline: Canadian defined benefit pension plans show increased funded levels in Q2: Aon
summary: Aon plc (NYSE: AON), a leading global professional services firm, announced today that the aggregate funded ratio for Canadian pension plans in the S&P/TSX Composite Index increased to 109 percent compared to 105.5 percent at the end of last quarter, according to the Aon Pension Risk Tracker.

headline: Aon plc Appoints David Carlson as Global Industrial and Manufacturing Leader, Effective July 1, 2025
summary: Aon plc announced David Carlson will join the firm as its global industrial and manufacturing leader, effective July 1. In this role, Carlson will be responsible for advancing Aon's industry strategy...
